go_data.justification: Estrogen receptor (ER) is mono-ubiquitinated by the BRCA1 ubiquitin ligase, implying nuclear localization.
Estrogen receptor (ER) interacts with BRCA1 ubiquitin ligase, indicating protein binding capability.

go_data.term: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
go_data.justification: Estrogen receptor (ER) is implied to have a role in transcriptional regulation, given its activity is inhibited by mono-ubiquitination.
